<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">My Roots -</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meine Wurzeln -</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mes Racines -</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Minhas Raizes -</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le Mie Radici -</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ρίζες μου -</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mis Raíces -</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners research their roots and origins and how they influence their personalities. They learn about the historical and socio/economic situation of the area the family comes from.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">roots</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">origins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">family tree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">personality</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger erforschen ihre Wurzeln und Ursprung und
wie sie ihre Funktionseigenschaften beeinflussen. Sie erlernen 
über das historische und socio/economic Situation des Bereiches die 
Familie kommt von.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants recherchent leurs racines et 
origines et comment ils influencent leurs personnalités. Ils se
renseignent sur l'historique et la situation de socio/economic de la 
zone la famille vient de.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners pesquisam suas raizes e origens e como
influenciam suas personalidades. Aprendem sobre o histórico e a
situação de socio/economic da área a família vem de.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti ricercano le loro radici ed origini
e come influenzano le loro personalità. Imparano circa lo 
storico e la situazione di socio/economic della zona la famiglia viene
da.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έρευνα αρχαρίων οι ρίζες και η προέλευσή τους και 
πώς επηρεάζουν τις προσωπικότητές τους. Μαθαίνουν για την 
ιστορική και κοινωνικο/οικονομική κατάσταση της περιοχής που η 
οικογένεια προέρχεται από.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes investigan sus raíces y 
orígenes y cómo influencian sus personalidades. Aprenden sobre
el histórico y la situación de socio/economic del área la familia 
viene de.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wurzeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stammbaum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenfähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktionseigenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">racines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">origines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arbre de famille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
